scripts.dev:deploy: yarn build:contracts && rm -rf neardev && (near dev-deploy || exit 0) && yarn patch:config
scripts.build:contracts: cd contracts/nft && ./build.sh && cd ../.. && cd contracts/market && ./build.sh && cd ../..
scripts.start:deploy: yarn patch:deploy-config && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev parcel src/index.html --open
scripts.static: mkdir dist && cp src/frame.html dist/frame.html && cp -r src/wasm-music dist/wasm-music
scripts.build: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev REACT_APP_API_HELPER=true parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps --public-url https://near-apps.github.io/gnr8/
scripts.build:local: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev REACT_APP_API_HELPER=true parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps
scripts.start:testnet: yarn config:testnet && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev parcel src/index.html --open
scripts.deploy:testnet: yarn env:testnet && yarn build:contracts && yarn node ./utils/patch-config-account.js && node ./utils/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:app:testnet: cross-env DEPLOY_ACCOUNT=gnr8-1.testnet yarn node ./utils/patch-config-account.js && yarn build && gh-pages -d dist
